title: NO FEE 2BR/2BA apartment with unobstructed city views!!
posting_body: ['Looking for someone to take over my existing lease for 2BR/2BA apartment in Prime Downtown Brooklyn.', 'South, West, and North exposure, sun-filled apartment on 32nd floor with unobstructed prime views of Downtown Manhattan, all 3 bridges, and East River in a luxury condominium - MUST SEE!', 'En-suite primary bedroom, large living room & kitchen - great for entertaining.', 'Comes turn-key ready, Washer & Dryer in the unit, Samsung wireless soundbar, floor-to-ceiling windows, hardwood floors, approx.', '1,100 sqft.', 'Full luxury amenities building: lobby & doorman, gym, rooftop with grill, lounge areas, outdoor rooftop pool (!!!)', 'Perfect location: walking distance to DUMBO, Brooklyn Heights, Boerum Hill, Cobble Hill.', "4-min walk to Trader Joe's.", '10-min subway ride to Downtown Manhattan, 30-min ride to Midtown Manhattan.', 'All major subway lines a walking distance away.', 'Video walkthrough: https://youtu.be/C8Z8s_7KJcU', 'Available on August 1.', "This one won't last - please contact to schedule an appointment."]
